net.bytebuddy.instrumentation.type.auxiliary

Class TypeProxy.ByReflectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.instrumentation.type.auxiliary.TypeProxy.ByReflectionFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StackManipulation
    Enclosing class:
    TypeProxy

    public static class TypeProxy.ByReflectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements StackManipulation
    Loads a type proxy onto the operand stack which is created by constructing a serialization constructor using the Oracle JDK's ReflectionFactory.newConstructorForSerialization(Class, java.lang.reflect.Constructor) method which might not be available in any Java runtime. When this stack manipulation is applied, an instance of the instrumented type must lie on top of the operand stack.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.bytebuddy.instrumentation.method.bytecode.stack.StackManipulation

    • Constructor Detail

      • ByReflectionFactory

        public ByReflectionFactory(TypeDescription proxiedType,
                           TypeDescription instrumentedType,
                           boolean ignoreFinalizer)
        Creates a new stack operation for reflectively creating a type proxy for the given arguments.
        Parameters:
        proxiedType - The type for the type proxy to subclass or implement.
        instrumentedType - The instrumented type which is the target of the method calls of the proxiedType.
        ignoreFinalizer - true true if any finalizer methods should be ignored for proxying.
